message.body: Lots of anxiety about the show, etc. how can I calm down? I don't have my pills
D what pills are you talking about?
The pills I take when I'm going to have an anxiety attack
Are you out? Can w refill?
No they're just at Scott's house in my work bag
Just slow down and take some deep breaths. You are a good person and you will do the best you can
I know you'll be fine because you're a hard worker
And I love you. Smiling helps too. It lifts your soft palate and it's easier to breathe. Humming too
